subject: Life
text:
You know it's funny how we all walk
 around at times trying to regain what's 
 left behind.

 Being alert is one thing, but being left
 behind is another.
 Now Ladies, just think about all of this 
 confusion that's out there.
 And Men, think about the future, and
 look around; couldn't life be better with
 one of these beautiful beauties?

 You know life is just reaching your
 goals. And achieving success which in terms 
 is not so hard to do.

 Life can be beautiful but it depends 
 upon you.
